Uses of Class
com.k2.XMLBuilder.XMLBuilder

    • Uses of XMLBuilder in com.k2.XMLBuilder

      Fields in com.k2.XMLBuilder declared as XMLBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected XMLBuilder XMLNode.xb 
      Methods in com.k2.XMLBuilder that return XMLBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected XMLBuilder XMLBuilder.allowOptionalEndTags()
      This method identifies the xml builder as allowing option end tags This is not allowed for pure xml but is allowed for html
      XMLBuilder XMLBuilder.includeProlog(boolean include)
      The method tells the builder whether to include the XML prolog in the output
      XMLBuilder XMLBuilder.setIndent(java.lang.String indent)
      This method sets the string value to repeat as the indent
      XMLBuilder XMLBuilder.setNullAttributeHandling(XMLBuilder.NullAttributeHandling nullAttributeHandling)
      This method controls how documents with null attributes are output in the resultant xml

      Create an instance of a data node for the given xml builder and string data

      Create an instance of a data node for the given xml builder, string data and identifying whether to xml encode the data

      Create an instance of an xml document for the given xml builder and root element tag
